PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-16052007-10-18,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAuthority to decline to refer back to the Commission for reconsideration and hearing the decision, contained within Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2007-246 of July 24, 2007, to issue a broadcasting licence to The National Broadcast Reading Service Inc. to operate a national English-language satellite-to-cable described video service to be known as The Accessible Channel.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2007-0097 Publication Date: 2007-10-31
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Authority to decline to refer back to the Commission for reconsideration and hearing the decision, contained within Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2007-246 of July 24, 2007, to issue a broadcasting licence to The National Broadcast Reading Service Inc. to operate a national English-language satellite-to-cable described video service to be known as The Accessible Channel.
